Package org.cryptonode.jncryptor

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    JNCryptor
    A JNCryptor encrypts and decrypts data in a proprietary format originally devised by Rob Napier.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AES256Ciphertext
    Base class for parsing and producing formatted ciphertext.
    AES256JNCryptor
    This JNCryptor instance produces data in version 3 format.
    AES256JNCryptorInputStream
    Reads RNCryptor-format data in a stream fashion.
    AES256JNCryptorOutputStream
    Writes RNCryptor-format (version 3) data in a stream fashion.
    AES256v2Ciphertext
    A format compatible with version 2.
    AES256v2HeaderData  
    AES256v3Ciphertext
    Version 3 format.
    PasswordKey
    Stores a secret key alongside the salt that was used during the key derivation.
    StreamUtils
    Methods for operating on streams.
    TrailerInputStream
    A wrapper for an input stream that contains trailer data.
    Validate
    A basic validation class very similar to Apache Commons Lang.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CryptorException
    An exception thrown when an error occurs encrypting or decrypting.
    InvalidDataException
    An exception thrown when invalid data is encountered.
    InvalidHMACException
    An InvalidHMACException is thrown when the HMAC value is incorrect, indicating that the data is corrupted.
    StreamIntegrityException
    Thrown when a stream fails HMAC validation.
